name: Saint Mjosgard
text: Activate: Main (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your Cost Area) you may rest this character and 1 of your characters: Add up to 1 black character with a cost of 1 or less from your trash to your hand.

effect.text: You may rest this character and 1 of your characters: Add up to 1 black character with a cost of 1 or less from your trash to your hand.
